text: hi guys I'm Laura Vitale on this episode

who's actually from Mexico now they
might not be authentic to where you
might be from but this is how she makes

then she makes some and then we eat them
with eggs and jalapenos and onions and
it's just so good so I watch to do it
enough time that I figured I needed the
recipe she gave it to me and I've been
very grateful

very few ingredients but there are all
the right ones you need some warm water
here what I have is some masa it's kind

then you take a little bit of veg oil
